jobDescription: White Glove Placement, Inc is currently seeking Radiology Travel RN Registered Nurses to fill open slots. Join our Team of Happy Nurses Today! As a Radiology Nurse you will care for patients undergoing diagnostic or therapeutic Radiology imaging and treatments. You will also make sure that the patients are mentally and emotionally ready to undergo medical procedures.  As a White Glove Radiology Travel RN Registered Nurse you will get: The salary YOU deserve!Customized pay packages for Travel NursesReferral Bonuses for referring your nurse friendsDirect Deposit for your conveniencePre-Taxed Metro Cards24 hours support by our caring team Requirements for Radiology RN Registered Nurses: Valid NYS RN LicenseCurrent or recent experience in Radiology OR ED/ICU experience with conscious sedation, and telemetry monitoringEligibility to work in the U.S.
